1.0.5.name: wordpress/wp-contactpage-designer
1.0.5.description:
Try our easy to use drag and drop contact form and page builder to create forms in minutes. Store multiple form templates then quickly add them to Pages using short code feature.

Free Version include 8 Form Controls - Label, Input Field, E-Mail Field, Text Area, Paragrph, Submit Button, Map, and Date

For more controls including - Image, Drop Down, Checkbox, Multiple Choice, Address, Captcha, Facebook, Twitter, Paypal, Price, Quantity, Total, and Time - check out our pro version at:

http://www.wppluginpros.com/shop/page-designer-pro/

Overview Video of the Free Version

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fjGCRSGwW6Y

Advanced Features Only Availble in the Pro Version

Order Form Example: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HBPboNlDmnM Contact form and page D
